sub_title: Senior Business Strategist Driving Growth and Profitability Through Data-Driven Insights
summary:
With over 20 years of experience in the connectivity and SaaS industries, I have developed a deep expertise in business strategy and driving business performance through data-driven insights. My proven track record of success and extensive experience in leading teams and developing new markets make me well-suited for senior leadership roles.

I am passionate about utilizing market and customer analytics to inform strategic decision-making and have a strong ability to communicate complex data insights in a clear and compelling manner. My tireless entrepreneurial spirit and curiosity in technological trends have allowed me to identify and capitalize on new business opportunities, driving growth and profitability for my organizations.

As a leader, I prioritize humility, fairness, integrity, responsibility, and sustainable living in every aspect of my work. I strongly believe in the power of continuous learning and am committed to staying ahead of the curve in a constantly evolving industry.

Overall, my combination of strategic vision, leadership experience, and deep industry knowledge make me a valuable asset to any organization seeking a senior leader with a track record of success.

My achievements include:
•	Innovated the business model with all-inclusive, simple bundles resulting in 3 million user growth in just 6 months, accounting for 50% of the customer base.
•	Stabilized market share in the face of 2 new entrants with customer-centric products and campaigns, while the main competitor lost 5 percentage points.
•	Achieved over $1.5 million/year savings by re-designing the customer lifecycle.
•	Managed Net Promoter Score (NPS) as the main KPI for customer engagement.
•	Guided the retail, sales, and call center teams with strategic direction and goal setting.
•	Supported the Telia M&A project (divestment) with commercial presentation and financial due diligence.', 'title': 'Consumer Director', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Tashkent, Uzbekistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Telia', 'description': 'As Marketing Director, I led a team responsible for consumer marketing, market research, product development, communications, and pricing. My achievements include:
•	Established sustainability processes including Anti-Corruption, Freedom of Expression, Sponsorships and Donations, and 3rd party due diligence. Overall, the Ethics and Compliance framework helped Telia reach favorable terms with FCPA investigators, resulting in a 40% or $0.5 billion penalty reduction.
•	Involved customers in product management and communications processes through a creatively designed "Ucell Friends" program.', 'title': 'Marketing Director', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Tashkent, Uzbekistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Telia', 'description': '•	Led a turnaround program that improved profitability through 70 cross-functional projects, resulting in up to 10 percentage point EBITDA improvement.

•	Advising group companies with pricing, business analytics & campaign management

•	Initiated and managed operational CRM project to implement Oracle Siebel solutions in the customer and sales automation
